function(add_spirvcross)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_CLI CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_TESTS CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_HLSL CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_MSL CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_CPP CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_REFLECT CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_C_API CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_UTIL CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  add_subdirectory(SPIRV-Cross)
endfunction()

function(add_glslang)
  set(BUILD_EXTERNAL CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(ENABLE_GLSLANG_BINARIES CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(ENABLE_HLSL CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  set(ENABLE_CTEST CACHE BOOL OFF FORCE)
  add_subdirectory(glslang)
endfunction()
